acrylic1.name: Art Print Under Acrylic Glass
acrylic1.description: Stable acrylic glass pictures with aluminum backing, perfect for timeless and high-quality presentations.

detailedDescription.title: Processing details: three-layer system for maximum effect
detailedDescription.text:
• Acrylic glass: Glossy, crystal-clear acrylic glass in 2 mm, 4 mm or 6 mm thickness enhances the depth effect and makes the colours shine.
  • High-quality print: Precise exposure on special photo paper that highlights details and colour intensity, sealed with permanently elastic silicone for a bubble- and crack-free lamination.
  • Alu-Dibond backing: Stable backing with a smooth surface for maximum durability and form stability.

detailedDescription.title: Why glossy acrylic?
detailedDescription.text:
Glossy acrylic highlights the colour intensity and contrast of your artwork while creating a fascinating depth effect. It is particularly suitable for colourful and detailed motifs such as abstract art, landscapes or modern designs.

  • 2 mm thickness: Subtle effects for smaller formats or understated presentations.
  • 4 mm thickness: The standard for gallery quality – perfect for medium to large formats.
  • 6 mm thickness: Maximum depth effect for impressive 3D effects with exclusive works of art.

detailedDescription.title: Custom formats
detailedDescription.text:
Every work of art is produced to the millimetre according to your specifications – from small formats to impressive XXL sizes.

  • Minimum size: 9 x 9 cm
  • Maximum size:
    • 240 x 122 cm for 2 mm thickness
    • 195 x 122 cm for 4 mm thickness
    • 180 x 122 cm for 6 mm thickness

Whether square, panorama or round format – your art will be presented exactly as you imagine it.

detailedDescription.title: Which artworks are suitable for acrylic glass?
detailedDescription.text: Glossy acrylic glass is ideal for vibrant, colour-intensive motifs that are to be enhanced by the luminosity and depth of the material. Abstract works, urban scenes or detailed nature motifs particularly benefit from the brilliant appearance. For works with subtle colours or a minimalist style, a matte surface can also be chosen to avoid reflections and achieve a calm effect.

detailedDescription.title: Longevity and protection
detailedDescription.text: The durable silicone seal protects your artwork from bubbles and cracks, while the acrylic glass is scratch-resistant and shatterproof. The combination of high-quality materials ensures that your art will shine for many years to come – perfect for collectors and lovers of high-quality presentations.

acrylic1.recursiveDescription: Let your artwork shine with glossy acrylic glass – a gallery-quality presentation that enhances any space!

detailedDescription.text:

detailedDescription.text:
• Formats: Manufactured with millimetre precision in 9:16, 16:9 or 1:1 ratios.

detailedDescription.text: Shadow gap frames are ideal for minimalist designs, modern artwork or photographs that are to be particularly emphasised by the floating appearance. They are suitable for both colour-intensive and monochrome motifs and are an elegant choice for private collections, galleries or exhibitions.

detailedDescription.text:
• High-quality workmanship: Guarantees a long lifespan for the frame.

detailedDescription.text:
• Revolutionary exposure process: Utilises all available image data for optimal clarity.
  • Enhanced paper quality: Fuji Crystal Professional Archive Maxima increases visual maximum density by 10%, revealing even the finest details in dark shadows.
  • Exceptional precision: Details remain clear even at close viewing distances.

detailedDescription.text:
• Modern cameras: Capture high-resolution images with negligible noise.
  • Revolutionary printing process: Brings out razor-sharp details, even in large formats.

• 21% increased colour space: Dark and saturated colours appear more brilliant and detailed.

imagecarrier1.name: Art Print on Aluminium Dibond in a Shadow Box Frame
imagecarrier1.detailedDescription:
Aluminium Dibond with Showcase Frame

The combination of aluminium dibond and showcase frame gives your artwork an impressive sense of depth and brilliant colour intensity. The robust aluminium dibond substrate ensures stability and a low intrinsic weight, making it ideal for larger formats.

Key Features

  • Sturdy aluminium dibond: Provides dimensional stability and lightness, even for large formats, thanks to its three-layer construction with two aluminium layers and a plastic core.
  • Extraordinary depth effect: The combination of aluminium dibond and the extra-deep showcase frame creates a modern and long-lasting presentation.
  • Brilliant colour intensity: Ensures vibrant and radiant colours for an impactful display.

Optional White Border

A freely selectable white margin between 1 cm and 12 cm creates an elegant distance between the motif and the frame, highlighting the work even more.

  • Customisable margin: Adds a refined touch to your artwork, emphasizing its presence within the frame.

imagecarrier2.name: Photo Print or Fine Art Print in a Shadow Box Frame
imagecarrier2.detailedDescription:
Showcase Frame with Premium Fine Art Papers

Present your artwork in a showcase frame that combines high-quality fine art papers with precise craftsmanship. The prints are smoothly mounted on matboard, preventing warping and creating a slightly raised effect. Customise your piece with seven mat colours and a border width of 5 to 20 cm for a personalised presentation.

Key Features

  • Smooth mounting: Prints are laminated onto matboard to avoid distortion and achieve a clean, raised look.
  • Customisable mats: Choose from seven colours and select a border distance between 5 cm and 20 cm to enhance your artwork.

Premium Fine Art Papers

  • William Turner: Matte watercolour texture, perfect for authentic portraits and extraordinary concepts.
  • Fine Art Pearl: Pure white surface with a silky shimmer, ideal for depth and precise contrasts.
  • Photo Rag: Soft cotton texture suitable for all types of motifs, offering impressive image depth.
  • Torchon: Coarse, bright white texture for three-dimensional and extravagant works of art.
  • FineArt Baryta: Glossy surface with a classic baryta paper structure for timeless elegance and brilliance.

Custom Formats

The showcase frame is available in millimetre-precise proportions, including 1:1, 16:9, or 9:16 formats. From small sizes to large-scale presentations, your artwork can be tailored to any dimension.

imagecarrier3.name: Floating Art in a Shadow Box Frame
imagecarrier3.detailedDescription:
Showcase Frame with Floating Presentation

A showcase frame with a floating presentation gives your artwork an extraordinary effect. The space between the work and the background creates the impression that the motif is floating in the frame, emphasizing the autonomy of the piece while providing an elegant visual finish.

Key Features

  • High-quality lamination on aluminium dibond: The artwork is smoothly mounted on aluminium dibond, a stable and lightweight material suitable for large formats in proportions such as 1:1, 16:9, or 9:16.
  • Floating impression: A 1 cm distance between the artwork and the background creates a modern, three-dimensional effect.
  • Customisable margin: The space between the work and the edge of the frame can be freely selected between 1 cm and 12 cm, allowing for a personalised presentation.

imagecarrier4.name: Floating Passe-Partout in a Shadow Box Frame
imagecarrier4.detailedDescription:
Showcase Frame with Floating Passe-Partout

A showcase frame with a floating passe-partout gives your artwork an extraordinary sense of depth. The space between the passe-partout and the background creates the impression that the passe-partout is floating, making the work appear to be set further back. This presentation focuses attention on the motif while creating an elegant, three-dimensional look.

Custom Mat Design

  • Floating effect: A 1 cm space between the mat and the background adds a modern sense of depth.
  • Mat width: Freely selectable between 3 cm and 30 cm, allowing for precise adaptation to your artwork.
  • Colour selection: Choose from ten colours to perfectly match the framing to your work.

Optional White Border

An additional white border of 1 cm to 12 cm can be selected to further accentuate your artwork and enhance its presentation.

Formats for Your Art

The showcase frame is available in millimetre-precise proportions, including 1:1, 16:9, or 9:16 formats – ideal for presenting your artwork in a stylish and professional manner.

fcrystalarchiveg.name: Fuji Crystal Archive, Glossy
fcrystalarchiveg.description: Fuji Crystal Archive DP II is a premium branded paper with a neutral base tone. The glossy version delivers vibrant colors and striking contrasts.
fcrystalarchiveg.detailedDescription:
Fujicolor Crystal Archive DP II

Fujicolor Crystal Archive DP II is a high-quality silver halide photographic paper specially developed for professional use. It offers exceptional colour brilliance, high maximum density for deep blacks, and impressive colour saturation. With a wide colour gamut and precise detail reproduction, it is ideal for demanding artwork and photography. Optimised for digital printing, the paper's durability of up to 75 years makes it perfect for galleries, exhibitions, or high-end art products.

Key Features

  • Exceptional colour brilliance: Vibrant colours with impressive saturation and depth.
  • Wide colour gamut: Ensures precise detail reproduction and tonal accuracy.
  • Durability: Colour fastness guaranteed for up to 75 years.

Available Finishes

The paper is available in the following finishes to suit various artistic styles:

  • Matt
  • Gloss
  • Silk
  • Velvet

Perfect For

  • Galleries and exhibitions
  • Professional portfolios and high-end presentations
  • Vibrant artworks with deep blacks and sharp details

uhdphotoprint.name: UltraHD Art Print
uhdphotoprint.description: The quality of an art print is only as good as the paper it’s exposed on. With the newly developed Fuji Crystal Professional Archive Maxima paper from Fujifilm, your ultraHD print meets the highest standards for color reproduction and detail accuracy.
uhdphotoprint.detailedDescription:
Fujicolor Crystal Archive Professional Paper Maxima

Fujicolor Crystal Archive Professional Paper Maxima is an UltraHD silver halide paper designed for demanding fine art and professional photography. It offers exceptional colour reproduction, deep blacks, and increased durability, making it ideal for galleries, museums, and high-end exhibitions where maximum detail and colour saturation are required.

Unmatched Image Quality

  • Extended colour gamut: 20-21% wider colour range for vibrant and precise details.
  • High D-Max density: Delivers deep blacks and exceptional tonal depth, ensuring clarity even in shadowed areas.
  • Light stability: Increased durability ensures artworks retain their brilliance for decades.

Available Finishes

This paper is available in multiple finishes to meet diverse artistic needs:

  • Matt
  • Gloss
  • Silk
  • Velvet

Perfect For

  • Gallery and museum-quality prints
  • Artworks with intense colours and precise details
  • Black-and-white photographs with high contrast
  • Exhibits designed for longevity
  • Professional portraiture and commercial photography

Quick Overview

  • High quality silver halide paper: Exceptional detail and colour reproduction.
  • Longevity: Colour fastness up to 75 years.
  • Diverse applications: Perfect for galleries, exhibitions, and professional photography.

muhdphotoprint.name: Metallic ultraHD Art Print
muhdphotoprint.description: Experience your motifs as images with a striking metallic effect! Artworks on Fuji Crystal Pearl captivate with their high-gloss surface and metallic sheen. This paper is perfectly suited for high-contrast images and night shots with abundant lighting.
muhdphotoprint.detailedDescription:
Fujicolor Crystal Archive Pearl Paper

Fujicolor Crystal Archive Pearl Paper is a premium silver halide paper featuring a unique pearlescent surface created by embedded pearl crystals. This shimmering metallic effect enhances the luxurious presentation of artwork while delivering exceptional colour reproduction, deep blacks, and an extended tonal range.

Key Features

  • Pearlescent surface: Embedded pearl crystals create a metallic shimmer for a sophisticated look.
  • High D-Max density: Ensures deep blacks and enhanced tonal depth for striking visuals.
  • Extended colour gamut: Vibrant colours with high saturation and precise detail reproduction.
  • Durability: Archive-ready with high light stability, ensuring long-lasting prints suitable for galleries and exhibitions.

Perfect For

  • Landscape artwork with vibrant colours and fine detail
  • Portraits with natural skin tones
  • Black-and-white images with enhanced contrast and depth
  • Artworks requiring a metallic sheen for a luxurious presentation
  • Commercial printing and high-quality displays

Quick Overview

  • Pearlescent finish: Unique metallic shimmer for eye-catching presentations.
  • Exceptional colour reproduction: Vibrant colours, deep blacks, and sharp details.
  • Archival quality: Durable prints ideal for exhibitions and galleries.

fflex.name: Fuji Flex
fflex.description: A warm base tone, exceptionally rich colors, and a high-gloss surface – these three compelling characteristics make Fujiflex High Gloss Paper the ideal choice for your artwork.
fflex.detailedDescription:
Fujiflex Crystal Archive Supergloss Paper

Fujiflex Crystal Archive Supergloss is a state-of-the-art silver halide paper with an ultra glossy finish, designed for professional applications. Its robust polyester (PET) base ensures exceptional durability and stability, while the mirror-smooth surface delivers impressive depth and exceptionally rich colours. This paper is ideal for large format printing, exhibitions, and high-end presentations requiring maximum image quality.

Key Features

  • Ultra glossy surface: Provides maximum colour saturation and reflective effects for a luxurious look.
  • High D-Max density: Ensures deep blacks and a wide tonal range, enhancing contrast and detail.
  • Durable PET base: Highly resistant and stable, ensuring long-lasting prints up to 75 years without yellowing.

Perfect For

  • High-quality artwork with vibrant colours and accurate detail
  • Large format presentations and exhibitions
  • Acrylic mounting for three-dimensional depth effects
  • Artwork with high contrast and deep blacks
  • Luxury photo products and commercial printing

Quick Overview

  • Glossy silver halide paper: Designed for professional use with a PET base.
  • Exceptional image quality: Deep blacks, vibrant colours, and impressive depth.
  • Versatile applications: Perfect for exhibitions, galleries, acrylic mounts, and luxury presentations.

ibwg.name: Ilford B/W Paper, Glossy
ibwg.description: Ilford paper is a pure black-and-white paper that delivers deep blacks and a color-neutral presentation without unwanted color casts. Thanks to its glossy surface, the contrasts in your image are highlighted with striking effect.
ibwg.detailedDescription:
Ilford Black & White Art Paper

Ilford is a leading manufacturer of black and white photo paper, offering a wide range of high-quality papers specially developed for discerning photographers and artists. Known for exceptional tonal reproduction, Ilford papers feature deep blacks, brilliant whites, and fine grey gradations, making them ideal for classic black-and-white photography and artistic expression.

Key Features

  • Silver halide technology: Ensures precise detail reproduction and impressive image depth.
  • Versatile options: Available in multigrade, fibre-based (FB), and resin-coated (RC) variants to meet diverse artistic needs.
  • Tonal precision: Offers the deepest blacks, brilliant whites, and smooth grey tones for exceptional contrast.

Perfect For

  • Classic black-and-white photography with high contrast
  • Fine art prints with precise details and neutral tones
  • Portraits and landscapes with fine grey gradations
  • Exhibition prints with long-lasting archival quality
  • Artistic projects requiring premium materials

Quick Overview

  • High-quality paper: Designed for professional use with silver halide technology.
  • Tonal excellence: Deep blacks, brilliant whites, and smooth grey gradations.
  • Variety of finishes: Available in glossy, matt, pearl, and fibre base variants.

ibwm.name: Ilford B/W Paper, Matte
ibwm.description: Ilford paper is a pure black-and-white paper that delivers deep blacks and a color-neutral presentation without unwanted color casts. Thanks to its matte surface the contrasts in your artwork are highlighted with striking effect.
ibwm.detailedDescription:
Ilford Black & White Art Paper

Ilford is a leading manufacturer of black and white photo paper, offering a wide range of high-quality papers specially developed for discerning photographers and artists. baryta.name: Baryta Paper
baryta.description: Baryta paper is an absolute classic among prints, renowned for its gallery-grade quality. The black-and-white print impresses with its exceptional paper thickness and a glossy surface, which gains a silky sheen thanks to the baryta structure.
baryta.detailedDescription:
Ilford Baryta Paper

Ilford Baryta Paper is a premium fine art paper designed for artistic black-and-white work and high-quality prints. Featuring a traditional barium sulphate coating, it offers an exceptional look and feel with impressive depth, brilliant whites, and velvety blacks, making it particularly effective for high-contrast artwork.

Key Features

  • Barium sulphate coating: Provides a classic baryta texture for a sophisticated and timeless appearance.
  • Exceptional tonal reproduction: Accurately reproduces greyscales and tonal values, ideal for detailed artwork.
  • High archival quality: Durable and conserving, perfect for museum and gallery-quality prints.

Perfect For

  • High-contrast black-and-white artwork
  • Museum and gallery-quality fine art prints
  • Reproductions of classic artworks
  • Detailed monochrome drawings or illustrations
  • Fine art projects requiring longevity and elegance

Quick Overview

  • Premium paper: Traditional barium sulphate coating for a refined finish.
  • Tonal excellence: Velvety blacks, brilliant whites, and superb depth.
  • Archival quality: Durable and ideal for long-lasting fine art prints.

hfapearl.name: Hahnemühle FineArt Pearl
hfapearl.description: A lightly textured surface with a silky sheen. Thanks to its impressive depth and precise contrasts, this paper is excellent for both color and black-and-white motifs.
hfapearl.detailedDescription:
Hahnemühle FineArt Pearl

Hahnemühle FineArt Pearl is a high-quality 285 gsm cellulose-based inkjet paper, specially developed for fine art applications. It features a brilliant white surface, subtle texture, and silky smooth feel. The premium pearlescent coating provides a sophisticated finish with impressive colour and detail reproduction, deep blacks, and high contrast.

Key Features

  • Pearlescent finish: Offers a luxurious look reminiscent of traditional silver gelatine photographic papers.
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free, ensuring maximum resistance to ageing for long-term preservation.
  • Exceptional detail: Delivers excellent colour reproduction, deep blacks, and precise details for both monochrome and colour prints.

Perfect For

  • High-quality reproductions of artwork with intense colours and fine details
  • Black-and-white artwork with deep blacks and high contrast
  • Photographic art projects requiring a luxurious presentation
  • Exhibitions, galleries, and limited editions
  • Long-term archiving of fine art prints

Quick Overview

  • Weight: 285 gsm cellulose-based paper with a pearlescent finish
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free for durability
  • Applications: Ideal for gallery-quality monochrome and colour prints

hwilliamturner.name: Hahnemühle William Turner
hwilliamturner.description: Textured matte watercolor paper with a natural white tone. It is particularly well-suited for authentic portraits and exceptional motif concepts.
hwilliamturner.additionalInfo: Natural White | 310 g/m² | 100% Cotton | White border required
hwilliamturner.detailedDescription:
Hahnemühle William Turner

Hahnemühle William Turner is a high-quality, traditionally crafted laid paper designed for fine art prints and reproductions. With a weight of 310 g/m² and a strong felt-like structure, it offers a distinctive tactile feel and exceptional visual depth. The matt inkjet coating ensures impressive colour reproduction, precise details, deep blacks, and high contrast.

Key Features

  • Classic texture: The pronounced felt-like structure adds an artistic touch reminiscent of watercolour or copperplate papers.
  • Archival quality: Made from 100% cotton, free from optical brighteners, acid- and lignin-free for maximum resistance to ageing.
  • Exceptional detail: Matt coating delivers brilliant colours, deep blacks, and sharp details for professional results.

Perfect For

  • Reproductions of paintings and drawings with strong artistic expression
  • Artworks with intense texture and three-dimensional effects
  • Black-and-white prints with deep contrasts and fine gradations
  • Limited editions and museum-quality exhibition prints
  • Art projects requiring longevity and archival-grade materials

Quick Overview

  • Weight: 310 g/m² handmade paper with a pronounced texture
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free for long-term durability
  • Applications: Ideal for art reproductions, black-and-white prints, and limited editions

hphotorag.name: Hahnemühle Photo Rag
hphotorag.description: FineArt paper made from 100% cotton with a fine, soft surface texture. It is versatile and suitable for all types of motifs.
hphotorag.additionalInfo: White | 308 g/m² | 100% cotton | White border obligatory
hphotorag.detailedDescription:
Hahnemühle Photo Rag®

Hahnemühle Photo Rag® is one of the world's most popular FineArt papers, known for its versatility and exceptional quality. Made from 100% cotton, it features a slightly felted structure and a pleasantly soft feel. With a weight of 308 gsm (also available in other weights), it combines stability, outstanding print quality, and artistic expression.

Key Features

  • Premium matt coating: Delivers brilliant colours, deep blacks, excellent contrast, and impressive detail.
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free, ensuring long-term durability for artwork that needs to retain its quality for decades.
  • Soft texture: The light felt structure provides a refined, natural feel and enhances visual depth.

Perfect For

  • Fine detail reproductions of paintings and drawings
  • High-quality black-and-white artwork with deep black tones
  • Photographic art projects with vibrant colours and high precision
  • Museum-quality limited editions and exhibitions
  • Artworks requiring a natural feel and archival-grade materials

Quick Overview

  • Material: 100% cotton paper with a soft touch and light felt texture
  • Coating: Premium matt finish for vibrant colours and precise detail
  • Durability: Acid- and lignin-free for maximum ageing resistance
  • Applications: Ideal for fine art reproductions, black-and-white prints, and photographic projects

htorchon.name: Hahnemühle Torchon
htorchon.description: FineArt paper with a matte, coarsely textured surface and pleasant tactile quality. It is ideally suited for extravagant motifs with a three-dimensional effect.
htorchon.detailedDescription:
Hahnemühle Torchon

Hahnemühle Torchon is a bright white, 285 gsm cellulose-based FineArt inkjet paper, designed to bring a unique tactile feel and impressive three-dimensional depth to your artwork. Its coarsely textured felted surface makes it ideal for fine art applications, while the premium matt inkjet coating ensures brilliant colours, perfect detail, and deep blacks.

Key Features

  • Distinctive texture: Coarse felt structure adds a vibrant, tactile character to prints.
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free, conforming to ISO 9706 standards for long-term durability.
  • Exceptional detail: Matt coating delivers excellent colour reproduction, deep blacks, and precise details.

Perfect For

  • Reproductions of watercolours and other classic artworks
  • Fine art prints with strong texture and three-dimensional effects
  • Black-and-white artwork with high contrast
  • Limited editions and museum-quality displays
  • Digital artwork requiring a special surface texture

Quick Overview

  • Material: Cellulose-based FineArt paper with a coarse felt structure (285 gsm)
  • Coating: Premium matt finish for vibrant colours and accurate detail
  • Durability: Acid- and lignin-free for maximum ageing resistance
  • Applications: Ideal for watercolour reproductions, monochrome prints, and digital artwork

hfabaryta.name: Hahnemühle FineArt Baryta
hfabaryta.description: FineArt paper with a glossy surface and classic baryta structure. Thanks to its impressive color depth and high contrast range, it is excellently suited for both color and black-and-white motifs.
hfabaryta.detailedDescription:
Hahnemühle FineArt Baryta

Hahnemühle FineArt Baryta is a bright white, 325 gsm cellulose-based FineArt inkjet paper that combines the traditional look of analogue baryta paper with modern inkjet technology. Its clearly visible felt structure provides a tactile surface texture, adding impressive three-dimensional depth and visual presence to artwork.

Key Features

  • Glossy coating: Delivers vibrant colours, deep blacks, and high contrast for outstanding print results.
  • Barium sulphate content: Enhances the classic baryta look, making it ideal for fine art reproductions and limited editions.
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free, conforming to ISO 9706 standards for exceptional longevity and durability.

Perfect For

  • Artwork with intense colours and fine detail
  • Black-and-white prints with deep blacks and high contrast
  • Reproductions of classic paintings and photographs
  • Limited editions and museum-quality displays
  • Artworks requiring a sophisticated, traditional look

Quick Overview

  • Material: Bright white 325 gsm cellulose-based paper
  • Coating: Glossy finish for brilliant colours and deep blacks
  • Tactile texture: Traditional baryta look combined with modern inkjet technology
  • Durability: Acid- and lignin-free for maximum ageing resistance (ISO 9706)
  • Applications: Ideal for art reproductions, black-and-white prints, and exhibitions

hpsilkbarytax.name: Hahnemühle Photo Silk Baryta X
hpsilkbarytax.description: Paper with a silky-glossy surface and subtle texture. It offers a wide color gamut with deep blacks, as well as high color density and brilliance.
hpsilkbarytax.detailedDescription:
Hahnemühle Photo Silk Baryta X

Hahnemühle Photo Silk Baryta X is a high-quality 310 gsm cellulose-based FineArt paper that combines the classic look of traditional silver halide photo paper with modern inkjet technology. Its silky gloss surface and creamy white base provide artwork with an elegant appearance and exceptional depth.

Key Features

  • Baryta coating: Ensures brilliant colours, velvety blacks, and impressive detail reproduction for luxurious presentations.
  • Wide colour gamut: Offers high colour density and precision, making it ideal for detailed artwork.
  • Archival quality: Acid- and lignin-free, ensuring durability and suitability for long-term preservation.

Perfect For

  • Artwork with vibrant colours and fine detail

  • Digital artwork requiring a smooth, silky finish

Quick Overview

  • Baryta coating: Provides vibrant colours and velvety blacks
  • Tonal precision: Excellent detail reproduction and wide colour gamut
  • Durability: Acid- and lignin-free for maximum ageing resistance
  • Applications: Ideal for fine art reproductions, black-and-white prints, and digital art

carchesarag.name: Canson Arches Aquarelle Rag
carchesarag.description: Pure white paper with a matte watercolor texture offers exceptional color reproduction and a wide tonal range.
carchesarag.detailedDescription:
Canson Arches Aquarelle Rag

Canson Arches Aquarelle Rag is a high-quality 310 gsm fine art paper made from 100% cotton, designed for fine art reproductions and digital artwork. Inspired by traditional watercolour paper, it features a natural felt-embossed texture reminiscent of classic handmade paper, offering exceptional stability and artistic depth.

Key Features

  • Natural texture: Felt-embossed surface provides a tactile quality and enhances the artistic presentation.
  • Matt surface: Ensures accurate reproduction of colours, deep blacks, and fine details for professional results.
  • Archival quality: Free from optical brighteners (OBAs), guaranteeing a natural white tone and long-lasting durability for prints.
  • Traditional craftsmanship: Produced using cylinder mould techniques for a classic, high-quality finish.

Perfect For

  • Reproductions of classic paintings and watercolours
  • Artworks with intense colours and fine textures
  • Black-and-white prints with high contrast and detail
  • Limited editions and museum-quality displays
  • Digital artwork requiring a traditional aesthetic

Quick Overview

  • Material: High-quality 100% cotton FineArt paper (310 gsm)
  • Texture: Felt-embossed surface for artistic depth
  • Coating: Matte finish for vibrant colours and precise detail
  • Durability: Free from optical brighteners for maximum archival quality

cbarytaprestige2.name: Canson Baryta Prestige II
cbarytaprestige2.description: Fine Art paper with a glossy surface and pronounced baryta structure. Thanks to its high contrast depth and vibrant color reproduction, it is perfectly suited for both color and black-and-white motifs.
cbarytaprestige2.additionalInfo: Natural White | 340 g/m² | Alpha-Cellulose and Cotton
cbarytaprestige2.detailedDescription:
Canson Infinity Baryta Prestige II Paper

Canson Infinity Baryta Prestige II is a premium 340 gsm fine art paper designed for the most demanding artworks and prints. Combining the aesthetics of traditional darkroom baryta papers with modern inkjet technology, it features a barium sulphate coating that provides natural whiteness without optical brighteners (OBAs). This ensures exceptional colour reproduction, deep blacks, and pure whites.

Key Features

  • Barium sulphate coating: Offers natural whiteness and enhances colour vibrancy and tonal depth.
  • Silky smooth surface: Provides impressive detail and an extended tonal range for both monochrome and colour printing.
  • Archival quality: Made from a blend of alpha cellulose and cotton, the paper is acid-free, FSC certified, and conforms to ISO 9706 standards for long-term durability.

Perfect For

  • Artwork with intense colours and precise details
  • Black-and-white prints with deep blacks and high contrast
  • Reproductions of classic paintings and photographs
  • Limited editions and museum-quality displays
  • Artworks requiring a sophisticated, traditional look

Quick Overview

  • Material: Premium 340 gsm FineArt paper with barium sulphate coating
  • Tonal precision: Natural whiteness with no optical brighteners (OBAs)
  • Durability: Acid-free, FSC certified, and archival (ISO 9706)
  • Applications: Ideal for monochrome printing, colour printing, and fine art reproductions

cragphotographique.name: Canson Rag Photographique
cragphotographique.description: A versatile paper with a smooth, deeply matte surface and a very subtle texture.
cragphotographique.additionalInfo: Bright white with a warm undertone | 310 g/m² | 100% cotton
cragphotographique.detailedDescription:
Canson Infinity Rag Photographique

Canson Infinity Rag Photographique is a premium fine art paper made from 100% cotton, designed for fine art reproductions and digital prints. Its exceptionally smooth, matt surface offers a soft, luxurious feel, while the ultra-white colour is achieved using natural minerals without the use of optical brighteners (OBAs).

Key Features

  • Ultra-smooth surface: Provides a sensual, refined finish ideal for high-quality artwork.
  • Museum-grade quality: Conforms to the highest archival standards (ISO 9706), ensuring durability and long-term preservation.
  • Exceptional Dmax values: Offers the deepest blacks and precise detail reproduction for both colour and black-and-white artwork.

Perfect For

  • High-quality reproductions of paintings and drawings
  • Artwork with intense colours and precise details
  • Black-and-white prints with deep blacks and soft greys
  • Limited editions and museum-quality displays
  • Digital artwork requiring a smooth, luxurious finish

Quick Overview

  • Material: 100% cotton paper with an ultra-smooth matt finish
  • Tonal precision: Exceptional colour reproduction and one of the highest Dmax values on the market
  • Durability: Museum-grade quality, free from optical brighteners (OBAs)
  • Applications: Ideal for fine art reproductions, black-and-white prints, and limited editions

efacottonsmooth.name: Epson Fine Art Cotton Smooth Natural
efacottonsmooth.description: Warm-tone paper with a smooth, natural surface. It is versatile and suitable for all types of motifs.
efacottonsmooth.detailedDescription:
Epson Fine Art Cotton Smooth Natural Paper

Epson Fine Art Cotton Smooth Natural is a premium fine art paper made from 100% cotton, designed for high-quality art prints. Its smooth, natural surface and warm white tone, free from optical brighteners (OBA-free), provide an authentic and elegant presentation of artwork. The matt coating ensures exceptional colour reproduction, deep blacks, and smooth tonal gradations, allowing even the finest details to be accurately reproduced.

Key Features

  • Natural surface: Smooth texture with a warm white tone for a timeless aesthetic.
  • Exceptional detail: Matt coating delivers vibrant colours, deep blacks, and precise tonal gradations.
  • Archival quality: Meets the highest standards for durability, ensuring artwork retains its quality for decades.

Perfect For

  • Fine art reproductions with smooth colour gradients and precise details
  • Black-and-white artwork with deep contrasts and fine gradations
  • Digital paintings or illustrations requiring a natural finish
  • Limited editions and museum-quality displays
  • Artworks needing a soft aesthetic and maximum durability

Quick Overview

  • Material: 100% cotton paper with a smooth, natural finish (300 gsm)
  • Tonal precision: Warm white tone without optical brighteners (OBA-free)
  • Durability: Archive-quality for long-lasting prints

efacottontextured.name: Epson Fine Art Cotton Textured Bright
efacottontextured.description: Pure white Fine Art paper with a subtle aquarelle texture and exceptional color reproduction.
efacottontextured.detailedDescription:
Epson Fine Art Cotton Textured Paper Bright

Epson Fine Art Cotton Textured Bright is a high-quality, archival fine art paper made from 100% cotton with a weight of 300 gsm. Featuring a subtle texture reminiscent of watercolour paper and a pure white shade, it provides an elegant surface for artistic applications. The matte finish ensures faithful reproduction of colours, tones, and details, making it ideal for vibrant and precise artwork.

Key Features

  • Subtle texture: Inspired by watercolour paper, the surface adds a distinctive artistic touch.
  • Exceptional colour reproduction: Matte coating delivers vibrant colours, deep blacks, and accurate tonal gradations.
  • Archival quality: Acid-free and cold-pressed, ensuring long-term durability for artwork that needs to be preserved for generations.

Perfect For

  • Reproductions of watercolours or classic paintings
  • Artwork with fine detail and vibrant colours
  • Black-and-white artwork with high contrast and precise tonal reproduction
  • Limited editions and museum-quality exhibitions
  • Artistic projects requiring a distinctive texture

Quick Overview

  • Material: High-quality 100% cotton FineArt paper (300 gsm)
  • Surface: Subtly textured surface inspired by watercolour paper
  • Tonal precision: Matte coating for vibrant colours and precise detail
  • Durability: Acid-free and archival for long-lasting artwork

etraditionalpp.name: Epson Traditional Photo Paper
etraditionalpp.description: Paper with a smooth, silk-gloss surface impresses with deep, rich blacks and is suitable for a wide range of motifs.
etraditionalpp.detailedDescription:
Epson Fine Art Cotton Textured Bright

Epson Fine Art Cotton Textured Bright is a high-quality, archival FineArt paper made from 100% cotton with a weight of 300 g/m². Featuring a subtly pronounced texture reminiscent of watercolour paper and a pure white tone, it provides an elegant surface for artistic applications. The matt finish ensures true-to-life reproduction of colours, tones, and details, making it ideal for vibrant and precise artwork.

Key Features

  • Subtle texture: Inspired by watercolour paper, the surface adds a distinctive artistic touch.
  • Wide colour gamut: Offers vibrant colours, deep blacks, and smooth tonal gradations for detailed reproductions.
  • Archival quality: Acid-free and cold-pressed, ensuring long-term durability for artwork preserved for generations.

Perfect For
